summary: This mod adds several mages from the Dragon Age series into Skyrim as companions.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=6][i]A-Maging Companions![/i][/size][/color][/font]
[size=3][i]﻿
[font=Times New Roman][quote]Because followers shouldn't just be 'amazing', they should be 'A-maging' get it...?[/quote][/font]
[/i][/size]

[size=4][i]This mod is my attempt at recreating several magi from the Dragon Age games as recruitable companions throughout Skyrim (yes I know they're not perfect and this is still a WIP until further notice).[/i][/size]

[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ff0000][size=4][b]Anders (Male Even Toned Accented)[/b][/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ff0000][size=4][b]Bethany Hawke (Female Even Toned)[/b][/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ff0000][size=4][b]Daylen Amell (Male Even Toned)[/b][/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ff0000][size=4][b]Dorian Pavus (Male Elf Haughty)[/b][/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ff0000][size=4][b]Jowan (Male Commoner)[/b][/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ff0000][size=4][b]Maevaris Tilani (Female Sultry)[/b][/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ff0000][size=4][b]Merrill (Female Young Eager)[/b][/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ff0000][size=4][b]Neria Surana (Female Unique Vex)[/b][/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ff0000][size=4][b]Solas (Male Unique Brynjolf voice)[/b][/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ff0000][size=4][b]Velanna (Female Condescending)[/b][/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ff0000][size=4][b]Vivienne (Female Elf Haughty)[/b][/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ff0000][size=4][b]Wynne (Female Old Kindly)[/b][/size][/color][/font]
[/list][font=Times New Roman]
[color=#ff0000][size=5][u]NOTE[/u][/size][/color]
[i][size=4]*I have not included Morrigan because there are already a few mods that add her to Skyrim, which were done by skilled modders above my quality of modding so I suggest using them if you want her in the game. If you don't like any of the elf warpaints, you can probably find a mod (like Wyldtats) and add your own to make them look more like the Vallaslin from Dragon Age. 

[/size][/i][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=6]Features[/size][/color][/font]
[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][i]All companions essential [/i][/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][i]All companions have "lightfoot"[/i][/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][i]Each companion has a unique mage/spell combinations [/i][/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][i]Individual voices [/i][/size][/font]
[/list][font=Times New Roman]

[u][color=#ff0000][size=5]NOTE[/size][/color][/u]
[size=4][i]*This mod does not contain any of the special armors from the screenshots! They are merely used for aesthetic posing & screenshots, if you want the followers to look like they do in the screenshots links below will take you to the specified mod pages where available. I repeat; these armors are [u]NOT[/u] included in the mod itself and were only used in order to showcase the mod.

[list]
[*][url=http://modtype.doorblog.jp/archives/16344176.html]DA2 Masked Mage Armor[/url]﻿ (Daylen Amell armor) by R0R0N0
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63854/][/url][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63854/][/url][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63854/][/url][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63854/][/url][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63854/]Battlemage Armor[/url]﻿﻿﻿ (Neria Surana armor) by UberSmaug
[*][url=http://modtype.doorblog.jp/archives/20128618.html]Bethany's Robes[/url]﻿ (Bethany Hawke) by XiNALVO
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39983/]Regal Huntsman[/url]﻿ Armor (Dorian Pavus armor) by DreamBurrow
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51569/]Ceremonial Bosmer Armor[/url]﻿ (Solas armor) by Calyps 
[*][url=http://modtype.doorblog.jp/archives/30136851.html]Merrill's Armor[/url]﻿ (Merrill) by Histeria & Vie 
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63634/]Noblesse Oblige[/url]﻿ (Maevaris Tilani's armor) by Jacknifelee
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73040]Wayfarer's Coat[/url]﻿ (Anders' armor) by Ellise
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25846]TERA Armors[/url]﻿ (Jowan & Vivienne) by Asianboy345
[/list][/i][/size][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=6]Credits [/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74568]Relationship Dialogue Overhaul by Cloudedtruth [/url]﻿[/size]
[*][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722]The Eyes of Beauty by LogRaam[/url]﻿[/size]
[*][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311]KS Hairdo's Renewal by Kalilies & Stealthic[/url]﻿[/size]
[*][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79622]The Witcher 3 Eyes by Oaristys [/url]﻿[/size]
[/list]
author: AedanStarfang
